name: Neon Baller 0.1
description:
Neon Baller 0.1 is a continuation of an experiment in physics based 3D platforming with improvements to audio, visual, and controls. Also includes a new map that can be beat in a little over two minutes if you time it right. 

This version also includes game pad support not listed in the game itself. 

Controls:

Movement= WASD/ Left Stick

Jump= Space Bar/ A (xbox) / X (ps4) 

Reset= Tab/ Y (xbox)/ Triangle (ps4)
